name: Angry Sun (Kalann)
description:
This game was made in 72h for Mini Jam 113 but I was 1,5 hours late to submit it.

Still, here it is!

[UPDATE] Turned out Mini Jam accepts late submissions! Thanks for reds0l and KingW for the help.

The Angry Syn is a bullet hell type game about planet Earth trying to survive the explosion of the sun.

The controls are shown in a mini tutorial in game but here it is just in case:

-Move your MOUSE to rotate the Earth

-Press SPACE to propel forward

-Click Mouse Left Button to fire rockets

-Click Mouse Right Button to open your shield
